snippet.title: Valiant Force 30s Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
"Valiant Force" is an original Japanese-style mobile tactical RPG!

"Valiant Force" combines the fun and strategic mechanics of Japanese-style mobile tactical RPGs with its own unique game modes and original anime art style. 

The game was released in November 2016 and reached over one million downloads within its first 6 months online, often placing it among the top ten ranked games in Asia. 

As an original and exciting turn-­based tactics RPG for Android and iOS, players may recruit over 200 unique characters to fight for their cause. Players will embark on an unforgettable journey that plunges them into the visually stunning fantasy world of Arathos, engaging in magical battles and following an epic storyline of good versus evil. It is up to the players to forge a glorious garrison as the final bastion of light against the encroaching darkness and engrave their acts of valor into the archives of history forevermore.

Tap to download Valiant Force:
https://goo.gl/N6gJhH 

Official Valiant Force Facebook Fanpage:
https://www.facebook.com/ValiantForce/


Dragon and Valiant 3D animation sequence: Caven Studios
https://www.facebook.com/CavenStudios/
